section.name: Maven Clover Plug-in Properties
section.p: The following is an overview of the various properties (and default values) used by the Maven Clover Plug-in build file. Most of these properties are optional and have defaults; however, there are mandatory properties that must be set as described in this document.

These properties can be overridden to change the default behavior of the Maven Clover Plug-in. If you need to override any of these properties, please refer to the Integration document for the preferred method of setting properties in your project.

tr.td: These properties specify various settings that control the behaviour of the Clover Plug-in.
Specifies the location of the Clover database. The default value is ${maven.build.dir}/clover/database.
